item.description:
It's Sunday, and they're not open again til Friday!

Have you ever wondered what it would be like to be stuck on a chairlift? Have you experienced it first hand? According to filmmaker Adam Green (of Jack Chop fame: http://www.youtube.co...) it's inevitable that at some point this will happen to you. I'm shakin' in my ski boots!

So in the spirit of ski porn season and saving your money for lift tickets, the Bretts are offering you a chance to see the (not quite) blockbuster hit Frozen for FREE! Baked goods are encouraged (alcohol is not permitted on the premises, so I recommend meeting beforehand at Matt Murphy's. Or after. Or both.)! The theater has 24 seats and a little room for extra chairs, so the event will be capped at 35. Hope you can make it!

Check out the trailer:
http://link.brightcov...
item.how_to_find_us: Take the elevator to the third floor, take a left
item.name: Frozen-The Film
